code: class EventHub{constructor(){this.callbackLists={};this.trigger=(eventName,data)=>{const callbackList=this.callbackLists[eventName];if(!callbackList){return;}Object.keys(callbackList).forEach(callbackRef=>{const callbackFunc=callbackList[callbackRef];callbackFunc(data);});};this.on=(eventName,callback)=>{if(!this.callbackLists[eventName]){this.callbackLists[eventName]={};}const callbackRef=String(Math.round(Math.random()*10000));this.callbackLists[eventName][callbackRef]=callback;return callbackRef;};this.off=callbackRef=>{if(!callbackRef){return;}Object.keys(this.callbackLists).forEach(eventName=>{const callbackList=this.callbackLists[eventName];if(!callbackList){return;}delete callbackList[callbackRef];});};}}export let Event=/*#__PURE__*/function(Event){Event[Event["LOADING_ON"]=0]="LOADING_ON";Event[Event["LOADING_OFF"]=1]="LOADING_OFF";Event[Event["SELECTED_ORGANIZATION_CHANGED"]=2]="SELECTED_ORGANIZATION_CHANGED";Event[Event["CALENDAR_TAB_ACTIVE"]=3]="CALENDAR_TAB_ACTIVE";Event[Event["OPEN_PROVIDER_CALENDAR"]=4]="OPEN_PROVIDER_CALENDAR";Event[Event["GROUP_CALENDAR_TAB_ACTIVE"]=5]="GROUP_CALENDAR_TAB_ACTIVE";return Event;}({});export default new EventHub();
